entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
